ygData.subject: Re: Enchanting Weapons/Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: We will likely be able to enchant the ore used to make the weapon and possibly also be able to bestow temporary enchantments to weapons similar to the Strength
ygData.messageBody:
We will likely be able to enchant the ore used to make the weapon and
possibly also be able to bestow temporary enchantments to weapons similar to
the Strength buffs for PCs.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 3:28 PM
> To: EQ Enchanters
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchanting Weapons/Armor
>
>
> From: "Chip Paul" <cpaul@...>
>
> The manual comments about this, but I assume it is not implemented
> yet. I suppose this is also because there are no Weapon molds for
> smiths? Perhaps some day we'll see an Enchant Ore spell? Just
> thought I'd bring up the topic. Anyone care to comment?
>
> Kaela of Tunare
>
